DOC.criteria: Veteran nonVeteran Able give inform consent Unstable heart disease Other systemic disease unlikely survive least 2 year Mental incompetence Prednisone > 20 mg/day Participation another interventional protocol within last 6 week Asthma Cystic fibrosis Clinically significant bronchiectasis Lung cancer cancer remission least 5 year Other inflammatory fibrotic lung disease Use antibiotic lung infection within past 4 week Autoimmune disease , i.e. , Rheumatoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythematosus , autoimmune hepatitis , Crohn 's disease
